wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Wolrige Gordon (10 August 1935 – 22 May 2002), was a Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party politician.

response: |Basil de Ferranti was the youngest MP for 15 days between his taking his seat after the 1958 Morecambe and Lonsdale by-election and Patrick Wolrige-Gordon taking his seat after the East Aberdeenshire by-election, 1958.
